creator: DEAR Systems
descriptionHtml:
DEAR Point of Sale (POS) platform provides advanced, multi directional integration with DEAR Inventory. In general integration works in the following way:
1. Customers purchase goods in store via DEAR POS.
2. DEAR POS sends sale order details to DEAR Inventory for each sale.
3. DEAR Inventory creates pending order in the staging area for each sale. Stock is allocated to the sales immediately.
4. Depending on timing configuration, pending sales will be converted to DEAR Inventory Sale Orders and stock is then written off the inventory account
descriptionShort: Mobile Point of Sale to streamline your retail experience

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: Improved support for Epson printers compatibility.

title: DEAR POS

creator: DEAR Systems
descriptionHtml:
DEAR Point of Sale (POS) platform provides advanced, multi directional integration with DEAR Inventory. In general integration works in the following way:
1. Customers purchase goods in store via DEAR POS.
2. DEAR POS sends sale order details to DEAR Inventory for each sale.
3. DEAR Inventory creates pending order in the staging area for each sale. Stock is allocated to the sales immediately.
4. Depending on timing configuration, pending sales will be converted to DEAR Inventory Sale Orders and stock is then written off the inventory account
descriptionShort: Mobile Point of Sale to streamline your retail experience

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: Bug fixing
